name: Spirit Grasp
text:
The following effects can be used once per Duel.
● Send 1 Level 8 DARK monster from your hand to the Graveyard. Then, draw 1 card.
● Can be used before your normal draw if you have at least 3 monsters in your Graveyard. Instead of conducting your normal draw, add 1 Level 5 or higher monster to your hand from your Graveyard. Then, select up to 3 Fiend-Type monsters and banish them.
This Skill can only be used if you begin the Duel with a Deck (excluding Extra Deck) that contains at least 1 "Dark Necrofear" and no monsters other than Fiend-Type or Zombie-Type monsters.
